statements: SELECT * FROM market_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT product_name, market_price, stock_quantity FROM market_data WHERE competitor_name = 'Competitor A';
SELECT competitor_name, competitor_price FROM market_data WHERE market_price > 100;
SELECT id, product_name, market_price, stock_quantity, competitor_name, competitor_price FROM market_data ORDER BY competitor_price DESC;
SELECT AVG(market_price), MAX(stock_quantity), MIN(competitor_price) FROM market_data;
SELECT * FROM market_data WHERE market_price > 1000 AND stock_quantity > 50;
SELECT id, product_name, market_price FROM market_data WHERE competitor_price < 500;
SELECT product_name, competitor_name, competitor_price FROM market_data WHERE market_price BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT * FROM market_data ORDER BY product_name ASC, market_price DESC;
SELECT product_name, AVG(market_price) AS avg_price FROM market_data GROUP BY product_name HAVING AVG(market_price) > 800;
SELECT * FROM MarketOpportunities;
SELECT product_name, category, profit FROM MarketOpportunities WHERE sales_volume > 1000;
SELECT id, product_name, category, sales_volume, profit FROM MarketOpportunities WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT market_name, market_trend, market_size FROM ExternalMarketData WHERE market_size > 500;
SELECT * FROM ExternalMarketData ORDER BY market_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM MarketOpportunities WHERE category='Electronics' ORDER BY sales_volume DESC;
SELECT product_name, category, profit FROM MarketOpportunities WHERE profit > 5000;
SELECT DISTINCT category FROM MarketOpportunities;
SELECT product_name, sales_volume, profit FROM MarketOpportunities WHERE sales_volume > 1000 ORDER BY profit DESC;
SELECT market_name, market_trend, market_size FROM ExternalMarketData WHERE data_source='Competitor' ORDER BY market_size DESC;
SELECT * FROM MarketOpportunities;
SELECT opportunity_name, industry_sector FROM MarketOpportunities WHERE id = 1;
SELECT description FROM MarketOpportunities WHERE industry_sector = 'Technology' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT decision_id, decision_title FROM BusinessDecisions WHERE decision_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT data_id, source, data_type, data_value FROM ExternalMarketData ORDER BY data_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM MarketOpportunities WHERE id = 1;
SELECT opportunity_name, description FROM MarketOpportunities WHERE industry_sector = 'Technology';
SELECT * FROM ExternalMarketData WHERE data_type = 'Sales' ORDER BY data_timestamp DESC;
SELECT decision_description, decision_date FROM BusinessDecisions WHERE decision_id = 2;
SELECT decision_id, decision_title, decision_description, decision_date FROM BusinessDecisions WHERE decision_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM market_opportunities;
SELECT opportunity_name, description FROM market_opportunities WHERE market_size > 1000 ORDER BY opportunity_name ASC;
SELECT decision_name, decision_category, decision_date FROM business_decisions WHERE decision_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT data_name, data_value FROM sql_data WHERE data_type = 'numeric' AND data_value < 50 ORDER BY data_value DESC;
SELECT source_name, data_description, data_date FROM external_market_data WHERE data_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM market_opportunities ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT opportunity_name, description FROM market_opportunities WHERE market_size > 1000;
SELECT * FROM business_decisions WHERE decision_category = 'Strategy' ORDER BY decision_date ASC;
SELECT decision_name, decision_category FROM business_decisions WHERE decision_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT data_name, data_type FROM sql_data WHERE data_value >= 100.50 ORDER BY data_name ASC;
SELECT company_name, industry, revenue FROM companies;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 100;
SELECT opportunity_desc, expected_return FROM opportunities WHERE opportunity_type = 'Investment';
SELECT * FROM market_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT decision_desc, decision_type, impact_score FROM decisions WHERE impact_score > 50;
SELECT * FROM companies ORDER BY company_name DESC, industry ASC
SELECT company_name, revenue FROM companies WHERE revenue > 100000 ORDER BY revenue DESC
SELECT * FROM market_data WHERE market_volume > 100000 AND stock_price > 50 ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT opportunity_desc, expected_return FROM opportunities WHERE opportunity_type = 'Investment' ORDER BY expected_return DESC
SELECT decision_desc, impact_score FROM decisions WHERE decision_type = 'Risk' ORDER BY impact_score DESC
